ygData.subject: Re: Has this ever happened to you?? and what can you do when it does
ygData.msgSnippet: Frezslice, I don t think you ve done anything wrong.  In game however it could have appeared so.  The group probably thought you had pulled the bandits
ygData.messageBody:
Frezslice,

I don't think you've done anything wrong. In game however it could
have appeared so. The group probably thought you had pulled the
bandits intentionally. There is little you could have done. As far
as training them to zone, there's nothing wrong with that either as
long as you send a /shout that you have a train coming to the zone
line. As far as what they can do to you, really all they can do is
kill steal and say things in /ooc and /shout to other players who
may be grouping with you. It is unfortunate that things like this
happen, but as long as you explain what happened there's nothing you
can do. If you play on Druzzil Ro, and are having problems with
them in-game send a /tell to Jaxum and I'll see if myself and some
guildmates can help you out.










--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Clay" <wolffmanus@y...> wrote:
> I have been playing EQ for about 2 years and enjoying every min.
of
> it. I play for only about 1 to 2 hours a day (maybe) so I really
get
> in to my time in the game. This sunday something new happened to
me.
> I have a 24th level Bar. shaman and have been grouping in Pav.
> Caverns to work up in levels. I logged on and ooc'ed asking to
group.
> I got not responce. I went to camp 1 aqnd found a good mixed group
> working it very well (8 people mixed classes teaming very nicely)
so
> I went to camp 2, There were 5 people 3 casters (2 mages and a
necro)
> a ranger and a fighter) all around 19 to 20., all at 100% health.
I
> asked if they wanted a healer/buffer and got "Shouted down" "This
> Camp is TAKEN GO AWAY"!!!....ok so I truned and started back. I
got
> jumped by 3 of the bandits. I Camp was not doing anything so I
pulled
> the mobs back in to the camp and ooced here is your mobs take them
I
> don't want to steal your kills(all the time I am getting
pounded) ..
> no one said anything so I ran .. about 1/2 way back I get
ooc'ed "WTF
> Frezz wait..." as I as all ready near the cave to SH and the zone
I
> just left... the "group" because of 5 mobs brok camp and ran (as
they
> ran they pulled 2 more) and "telled" me to death about how they
were
> going to cause me problems every time they see me and ect...
>
>
> A. did I do wrong by trying to "not steal" the camp's mobs
>
> b. what do I do about the "problems" I might have later by thes
> people?
>
>
> I like doing the right thing and playing with people not causeing
> problems for others...
>
> Frezslice
> 24 circle Shaman of the North
